name: Raining Hats On Frogs
description:
Press space to poop out a hat for your froggy friends, pay attention to the wind because it'll blow your hats off course.

If you miss too many frogs with your poop hats, then an angry thunder cloud will bop you right back to the menu screen.

Made for the rain jam: https://itch.io/jam/rain

Music used: https://freesound.org/people/aptbr/sounds/441300/
